meanings.definition: Of or relating to an erect penis.
meanings.sent1: The statue had an ithyphallic figure, symbolizing fertility.
meanings.sent2: The ancient artwork displayed ithyphallic symbols as a form of worship.
meanings.sent3: The comedic play featured a character with an ithyphallic costume for laughs.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was ithyphallic, standing tall and proud in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The bold warrior's stance was ithyphallic, exuding strength and power.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or pertaining to an erect penis.
meanings.sent1: The ithyphallic imagery in the painting was controversial.
meanings.sent2: The ritual dance included ithyphallic movements to honor masculinity.
meanings.sent3: The quirky artist created an ithyphallic sculpture that sparked discussions.
meanings.sent4: The towering skyscraper had an ithyphallic shape, reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The bold statement had an ithyphallic impact, leaving a lasting impression.
